dimensions: Warp x Weft: 23.5 x 14 cm (9 1/4 x 5 1/2 in.)
title: Moresque
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, silk
Technique: slit tapestry, reversible, all selvedges finished
description: Green cotton warps interacting with a variety of purples in the weft, ranging from burgundy to magenta, with touches of blue and turquoise. Solid bands at the top diverge into six pendants, regroup and split again into nine pendants at the bottom.
name: Textile
